page.description: The Page Layout Builder allows you to create a complex layout that contains multiple components. Components can be placed in tabs, accordions, displayed in popup windows, or shown in-page.

videos.description: Learn how to create a web application using the Page Layout Component in this two-part video series. These videos demonstrate the Page Layout Component.
